bibl.title: Is Oratory Written on Narrower Columns? A Papyrological Rule of Thumb Reviewed.
bibl.note: The supposition that oratory, or any other literary genre (in part. history or philosophy), was written to a narrower column, does not find support among extant works from Oxyrhynchus. - Pp. 425-427: lists prose column widths by genre for 116 extant prose works among Oxyrhynchus literary papyri.
